content:
1- El Deathmatch masmo7 fe LV bas,enta masmo7lak enak t2tl el cops lw homa bygro warak Mt2tlsh 2y 7ad gwa beet aw m7l 7ata lw fe LV
2- Mtst3mlsh 2y cheats 2w 2y buggs 3shan da bygeblak ban mo2abad
3- Mtshtmsh 2y 7d w mt3'latsh fel nas fel mainchat 2w el localchat w low fdltsh tshtm fe hygeblak punishment
4- Mdy2sh el server staff 3shan hysabeblak b punishment
5- Mt3mlsh evaid l2y punishment evaid enak t2fl el game lma staff ys2alak 7aga 3shan da hysabeblak punishment 2kbr
6- Mttklmsh 3n 2y server tany y2ma ygelak punishment
7- Msh masmo7lak enak tst3mly 2y buggs 2w cheats 2w enak tb3at hack l7d y2ma hygelak punishment wmt3mlsh troll llplayers 3shan ttd7ak bas
8- Mtgbersh 2y 7d eno y3ml 7aga hwa msh 3awz y3melha
9- Mttklmsh 2y lo3'a tanya 3'er en english fel main chat,enta momken ttkalm 3arby fel SMS 2w fel localchat
10- Mtst5bash 3nd el mostashfa 2w t2tl 7ad henak lsa m3molo spawn 2w t3melo arrest we lsa hwa m3molo spawn
11- Mtfdalsh t3ml spam llnas b2y hack 2w cheat,Mttkalemsh b2y 7aga 3'alat fel support chat,lw 3mlt hygelak mute
12- Mtb3sh accounts 2w 2y game tanya account fe CSG
13- Lazm tsta3ml asma2 3adya msh 2y 7aga zy klasjd 2w 456679 l2enak hygelak punishment
14- Mdy2sh el nas ely btl3ab fel game l2enak lw 3amalt kaza mara hygelak punishment
15- Dayman tsma3 kalam el staff bto3 el server
